name: Harvest Pen
description:
Collect fruits using your markers, “Bouncy blue” “rather red” and “grabber green”. You just have to choose the right ink and sketch the path !

////The game (Code and Art) was made in 29h !  for the Ludum Dare 52 (01/2023///

Known Issues:

Big patched update : the crash problems is resolved ! (11jan23 )

The game can currently crash a lot depending on your computer’s performance. I will try to patch it soon.
